name: Make Me Rich
description:
This is a local multiplayer game for 2-4 Players. The goal is to see who can earn the most money within 50 years.

Controls:

  •  Mouse point and click
  • A/D (or left/right arrows) to move the cities panal.
  • Escape to  quit the game
  • M to toggle the music On/Off

The game was made for LD49. It's a bit unfinished, but it's playable.

Good luck and have fun
